string-array.name: top_tips
string-array.item: "If you have any issues with the app, please use email to notify me. If you wish, do post a negative review on Google Play, I'm not trying to stop that, but please email too. There is a link to send me an email at the top of the slide-out drawer menu. I can provide much more comprehensive support to an email address. Many thanks."

"You can only see files to select for upload that are acceptable to upload on your server. If you wish to upload videos, be sure to alter your server config.inc.php file to include $conf['upload_form_all_types'] = true; rather than false"
If an upload just won\'t succeed, try using the preference in the app settings upload page to clear any residual failed uploads from the server
Error always occurs when trying to update tags - \"You are not allowed to delete tags\" - Ensure users can both add and delete tags (server plugin setting)
Share files from a different app with this app to add them to the upload screen ready to go to your current server
Long click on an image (either thumbnail or slideshow item) that has failed to load in order to retrieve it again
Long click on an album to delete that album and all content
Long click on an album image to enable bulk selection of images for an action
When viewing any image in the slideshow, long click to rotate / change image size shown / allow further zooming
You can zoom into an image when viewing in a slideshow by drawing two fingers together or apart on the screen
When logged in as an administrator, before handing your device to a friend to view your photos, engage the application lock feature to prevent inadvertent changes being made to your gallery
Once you have viewed an entire video, if local file caching is enabled, it is possible to save that video to your downloads folder
Long click delete button on a \'file for upload\' to delete all files to be uploaded (when job is not in progress)
If images are slow to load, check that your server automatically generates the size used by this app when they are uploaded

string-array.item: "* Primarily Bugfixes only * Possibly a complete re-write of the upload process as it doesn't lend itself to being improved iteratively * Possibly a complete re-write of the app with a focus on simplicity for general user browsing initially"
"Change: - Performance improvement investigation and hopefully implementation for upload data transfer speed"

string-array.name: release_history
string-array.item: "Bugfix: - Correct orphan locator and load code"

"Change: - If resource sort order is inverted, resources within a tag or favorite list will also appear in reverse order Bugfix: - immediately show path to folder after adding it as a root rather than initially showing just the folder name - corrected paged loading of favorites and tagged items - immediately update photo count on child folder shown after items are moved to a folder and then user navigates to parent - immediately update thumbnail shown for folder after changing its representative image and then user navigates to parent - crash if user reverses sort order while viewing an album, with photos, and then doesn't manually reload album contents - re-enabled navigation to root of gallery using the breadcrumb at the top of the album view - correct the hide and expand of albums (recently broken) - thumbnails correctly redrawn toggling child albums heading repetitively"

"Bugfix: - only the first root folder of a given name was visible in the file selection roots selector Change: - implement the refresh button on the slideshow 'item not loaded' page - implement the back button on album select - reverse through breadcrumbs - implement the back button on folder select - reverse through breadcrumbs"
"Bugfix: - Crash where a connection profile id would not be a legal filename - Fix upload freezing near the end of multiple chunk uploads"

"Bugfix: - when restarting a job, ensure the original job settings are used - when deleting a failed job, remove any compressed but not uploaded file - unable to scroll through errors in upload status page Change: - Upload status errors are now listed most recent first with an improved layout - Vast improvement to the resilience of the upload of files, lots of bugs off the perfect path fixed - Performance improvement for all http server calls - Don't delete a compressed file if a job fails (wait until it is deleted) - to allow retry without re-compressing - ensure chunks uploaded are as large as possible within the configured maximum chunk size"
"Bugfix: - Several unexpected errors - ordering error on slideshow and album pages"
"Bugfix: - Admin list of tags merged correctly with user list on tags load - Allow delete of tags for admin users - PiwigoClientWsExt plugin version check corrected"

"Bugfix: - crash on slideshow (if you still encounter crashes here, please email me if you work out what sequence of events causes it'. - crash after deleting user or group - user and group display not updated after adding an item"

"Bugfix: - PiwigoClientWsExts plugin version warning not appearing for affected users - limit added to length of server response displayed when showing error response - on retry of server call after http 4xx, don't just return cached errors"
"Bugfix: - crash on older versions if permission not granted to use cache folder - logs sometimes not sent if app crashes too quickly after logging error"
"Change: - Improved support for audio file upload"

"Bugfix: - uploading files shared by some apps can fail silently - job status view for jobs that finished with some failures not available after job finishes - about screen won't open - any identified causes of app crashes Change: - A file that has its upload cancelled by the upload job due to error will show a red X - The upload errors are now grouped by local file on upload job status page - If an upload fails, a new dialog prompts with the options for problem resolution"

"Bugfix: - videos not identified if using privacy plugin and videos accessed from /galleries. - slideshow and album view pages do not handle orientation change correctly Change: - app now recognises that some servers store videos under /galleries rather than /upload"
"Bugfix: - orphan item page load causing a crash Change: - name given to task progress trackers to allow bug resolution where child task of a progress tracker is unexpectedly incomplete"
"Bugfix: - Finally! worked out why the app was crashing on the slideshow for some users - tweaked some dialog layout Change: - Dialog showing all release notes since you last updated after an update"
"Change: - Tidy up the app preferences pages"

"Bugfix: - Multimedia URIs not working for non privacy plugin users. - video playback doesn't start if preference set not to include videos in slideshows Change: - there is a new setting in the connection preferences for privacy plugin uri repair"

"Bugfix: - Crash multiple child albums show next to each other with an odd number of child albums present (landscape mode or large screen devices) - Upload Job - Upload to Piwigo server list not selectable (impact for users with more than one server connection profile configured in the app) - server albums don't load on first entry to automatic upload job select a category preference - server album thumbnails not loading for child folders on upload to folder selection - Unable to select upload to server album for automatic upload job using non default server"

"Change: - Added statement for your clarity at the top of the email template created by this app for support requests - Paid Only: Added support for notification of updates being available for the server or plugins"

"Bugfix: - Tidy up of a lot of issues causing crashes across the app following the last month of changes - Default setting for video compression corrected - Re-added support for minimise albums - fix videos not being detected Changes: - Removed option to specify which files are video playable. This is done based on file extension derived mimetype"

"Bugfix: - Potential for one resource to be missed from the album resource slideshow (full screen preview) - crash on preview of orphaned file Change: - preview of orphaned files and view within a slideshow if wished is now supported - orphans menu option is only available to admin users when app not readonly"

"Bugfix: - Hopefully the final bug where album thumbnails appeared not to be loading correctly Changes: - When deleting an album, child resources can be either unlinked, or deleted from the server - Paid Only: There is a new orphaned resource management page"

"Bugfix: - Rewrite of the album, tag, and favorite sorting code because it was riddled with bugs : If something in this area now doesn't work as you expect, please let me know. : This should solve crashes that were occurring on the slideshow page - The recently altered yellow star icon wasn't appearing in some sort orders - Correct the loading of thumbnails - Fix bug preventing manual reload of failed thumbnail load by clicking - just once so it isn't too iritating if you want to change album Changes: - New preference to allow independent sort order reversal of child albums and resources"

"Bugfix: - Problems caused in upload after re-working the file selection for keystore and certificates : Thanks for your patience, android file permissions management is tricky - delete of albums in root now always available on app load if appropriate - items can now be selected by clicking anywhere not just in the checkbox"

"Bugfix: - Keystore and Trusted certificate item editing caused crash. : Please email me from the app when key functionality like this doesn't work. - Sometimes unable to navigate out of recent files with system file selection - Groups list vertically aligned to the center of the screen Changes: - Better User experience for keystore and certificate import - New preference to control the length of time the image detail is shown in the fullscreen or slideshow view"

"Bugfix: - Recent changes made it impossible to have both the free and paid versions installed at the same time on a single device - album thumbnails not always showing for admin user - tested against Piwigo 11. Opening an image was not working"
